title: Reports
description: Generate customizable PDF reports from your analysis

fileName.hint: Leave empty for auto-generated name with timestamp
fileName.duplicate: A file with this name already exists. Choose a different name.

myReports.noDirectoryDesc: Run an analysis first so the application knows where to look for generated reports.
myReports.emptyDesc: Reports you generate will appear here. Go to the Create Report tab to build your first report.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Report
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this report?

templates.title: Report Template
templates.description: Choose a preset or customize every detail
templates.executiveDesc: A concise overview with key metrics, sentiment distribution, strengths and opportunities. Ideal for quick briefings.
templates.detailedDesc: Comprehensive report with all metrics, visualizations, summaries and strategic insights. For in-depth review.
templates.visualOnlyDesc: Focused on charts and visualizations with essential metrics. Perfect for presentations.
templates.customDesc: Build your own report by selecting exactly which sections to include.

sections.title: Report Sections
sections.description: Select the sections you want to include in your report
sections.coverPageDesc: Title page with report name, date and dataset information
sections.tableOfContentsDesc: Auto-generated index of all included sections
sections.kpisDesc: Total reviews, average rating, sentiment percentages, best & worst categories
sections.sentimentAnalysisDesc: Sentiment distribution breakdown with percentages and counts
sections.subjectivityAnalysisDesc: Classification of reviews by subjectivity type
sections.ratingDistributionDesc: Star rating breakdown across all reviews
sections.temporalAnalysisDesc: Date range and review timeline information
sections.strengthsDesc: Top-performing categories and sub-themes by positive sentiment
sections.opportunitiesDesc: Categories and sub-themes with the most improvement potential
sections.visualizationsDesc: Generated analysis charts organized by category
sections.summariesDesc: AI-generated summaries — global and per category
sections.pipelineTimingDesc: Execution time breakdown for each analysis phase
sections.datasetValidationDesc: Date coverage, categories identified, subtopics detected and recommendations
sections.generationReportDesc: Which charts were generated, omitted and recommendations per section

visualizationCategories.title: Visualization Categories
visualizationCategories.description: Select which chart categories to include

success.title: Report Generated
success.message: Your report has been saved successfully.

errors.noDataDesc: Run the complete analysis pipeline first to generate the data needed for the report.
errors.noOutputDir: No output directory configured. Please set one in Settings → Advanced.
errors.noVisualizationsAvailable: No visualizations available for the report
errors.noSummariesAvailable: No summaries available for the report
errors.noInsightsAvailable: No strategic insights available for the report
